title: Live From Richmond!
description:
Lucy Bonino, Rose Grant and Sumer Gilmore share about disastrous flirtation, caring for the dying, and a baby gone missing.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (The Modern Jazz Quartet, Lucy Bonino, Hayley Kiyoko, Rose Grant, Ruby Velle & The Soulphonics, Sumer Gilmore, Hollow Coves, kevin Allison)
